newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed to lower in slower trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed to lower in slower trade.

text.p: Croatian stocks closed mixed to lower in slower trade on Tuesday, with brewery Karlovacka Pivovara resisting the trend, gaining 14 percent to 570 kuna.
* Of 16 issues seven fell, three rose, and six were flat.
* Volume shrank by more than half to 8,527 from 18,694 units, turnover also down to 4.8 million from 11.5 million kuna.
* Biggest gainer Karlovacka Pivovara added 70 kuna (or 14 percent) to 570 kuna, on volume of 2,120 shares.
* Karlovacka was also the most active issue.
* Biggest decliner hotelier Suncani Hvar lost three kuna to close at 52, with 121 shares sold.
